original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang sngags kyi sgor spyad pa spyod pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa dang sngags kyi sgor spyad pa spyod pa'o //
translated: Guhyapati, those who have previously familiarized themselves with the way of practicing Secret Mantra of the Mahayana will generate great delight and faith in their minds when they see or hear the way of practicing Secret Mantra.

original: de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod /
analyzed: de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sngags kyi spyad pa spyod /
translated: Guhyapati, those who have previously familiarized themselves with the way of practicing Secret Mantra of the Mahayana will generate great delight and faith in their minds when they see or hear the way of practicing Secret Mantra.🔽Guhyapati, those who have previously familiarized themselves with the way of practicing Secret Mantra of the Mahayana will generate great delight and faith in their minds when they see or hear the way of practicing Secret Mantra.🔽Guhyapati, those who have previously familiarized themselves with the way of practicing Secret Mantra of the Mahayana will generate great delight and faith in their minds when they see or hear the way of practicing Secret Mantra.

original: sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /🔽de la yang khyad bar ni gcig ni @308a * //
analyzed: sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de /🔽de la yang khyad bar ni gcig ni @308a * //
translated: Guhyapati, those who have previously familiarized themselves with the way of practicing Secret Mantra of

original: sngags gtso bor sgrub cing pha rol tu phyin pa zhar la spyod la /
analyzed: sngags gtso bor sgrub cing pha rol tu phyin pa zhar la spyod la /
translated: The first practices the mantra vehicle primarily and the perfection vehicle secondarily.

original: gcig ni pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bo bsgrub cing sngags zhar la spyod de /
analyzed: gcig ni pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bo bsgrub cing sngags zhar la spyod de /
translated: The second practices the perfection vehicle primarily and the mantra vehicle secondarily.

original: de ltar spyod pa gnyis ka yang chen po'i mtshan nyid du gcig ste /🔽sems can gang de lta bu'i theg pa chen po la tshe rabs snga ma rnams su thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i sgo nas ma zhugs shing nan tan du ma byas pas ni gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams thos sam /
analyzed: de ltar spyod pa gnyis ka yang chen po'i mtshan nyid du gcig ste / sems can gang de lta bu'i theg pa chen po la tshe rabs snga ma rnams su thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i sgo nas ma zhugs shing nan tan du ma byas pas ni gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams thos sam /
translated: Both of these practices are the same in being characterized by the Great Vehicle.

original: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa mthong na yang dad pa dang dga' ba mi skye ba'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa mthong na yang dad pa dang dga' ba mi skye ba'o //
translated: However, those sentient beings who in their previous lives did not enter the Great Vehicle through listening, reflection and meditation and did not practice it, when they hear the teachings through the method of practicing the mantra vehicle or see a mandala and so on, faith and joy do not arise in them.

original: sngags kyi spyod pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dag sngon goms par byas pa ni gnyis ka la yang dad ba skye ste sngags spyod pa la goms par byas pas kyang pha rol phyin pa mthong ngam ma thos na dga' zhing dad pa skye la
analyzed: sngags kyi spyod pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dag sngon goms par byas pa ni gnyis ka la yang dad ba skye ste sngags spyod pa la goms par byas pas kyang pha rol phyin pa mthong ngam ma thos na dga' zhing dad pa skye la
translated: Those who have previously become familiar with the conduct of mantra and the conduct of the perfections will develop faith in both.🔽Those who have become familiar with the conduct of mantra will be delighted and will develop faith when they see or hear about the perfections.

original: / pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la goms pas kyang sngags kyi spyod pa mthong ngam thos na dga' zhing dad pa skye'o //
analyzed: / pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la goms pas kyang sngags kyi spyod pa mthong ngam thos na dga' zhing dad pa skye'o //
translated: Those who have become familiar with the conduct of the perfections will be delighted and will develop faith when they see or hear about the conduct of mantra.

original: de bas na gang dag gis theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa la goms par byas pa zhes gsungs pa yin te /🔽de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na gang dag gis theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa la goms par byas pa zhes gsungs pa yin te / de bas na /
translated: Therefore, it is said that those who have become familiar with the limitless doors of accomplishing the conduct of mantra in the Great Vehicle are called those who have become familiar with the conduct of mantra.

original: theg pa chen po gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'di lta bu la goms par byas pa ni gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul 'di la dang cing snod du 'gyur gyi gzhan rnams ni ma yin na zhes pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'di lta bu la goms par byas pa ni gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul 'di la dang cing snod du 'gyur gyi gzhan rnams ni ma yin na zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, those who have become familiar with the conduct of mantra in the Great Vehicle will be vessels and will have faith in this conduct of mantra, but others will not.

original: sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa zhes pa ni theg pa chen po de nyid kyi yon tan te /
analyzed: sgo mtha' yas pa sgrub pa zhes pa ni theg pa chen po de nyid kyi yon tan te /
translated: The accomplishment of infinite doors refers to the virtues of that very Mahayana.

original: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos rnams sgrub pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang / khro bo dang / pho nya la sogs pa'i sgo rnam pa mang po sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos rnams sgrub pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang / khro bo dang / pho nya la sogs pa'i sgo rnam pa mang po sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is because it accomplishes the qualities of a Buddha, such as the powers and fearlessnesses, and because it accomplishes the many kinds of doors such as the kings of knowledge, wrathful ones, messengers, and so on.

original: de dag ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin te zhes pa ni de lta bu'i theg pa chen po la goms par byas pa'i sems can de dag gi sems shin tu brtan te /
analyzed: de dag ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin te zhes pa ni de lta bu'i theg pa chen po la goms par byas pa'i sems can de dag gi sems shin tu brtan te /
translated: They are Vajrasattvas is to say that the minds of those beings who have become familiar with the Mahayana in that way are extremely stable.

original: mu stegs dang bdud la sogs pas mi bzlog pas de dag gi sems rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'o//
analyzed: mu stegs dang bdud la sogs pas mi bzlog pas de dag gi sems rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa'o//
translated: Since they cannot be turned back by tirthikas, maras, and so on, their minds are like a vajra, and so they are called Vajrasattvas.

original: de rnams nyid kyi don gyi phyir grangs kyi tshad 'di byas so zhes pa ni de lta bu'i sems can shin tu dkon pas na grangs kyi tshad mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: de rnams nyid kyi don gyi phyir grangs kyi tshad 'di byas so zhes pa ni de lta bu'i sems can shin tu dkon pas na grangs kyi tshad mdzad pa yin no //
translated: For the sake of them alone, this number was made is to say that since such beings are extremely rare, the number was made for their sake.

original: 'on kyang slob dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar yi dam bca' ba kho nar bya ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang slob dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar yi dam bca' ba kho nar bya ste /
translated: However, the master who possesses great compassion should make the vow to liberate the entire realm of sentient beings.🔽In order to become the cause of enlightenment, one should take up immeasurable sentient beings.

original: des byang @308b chub kyi sems kyi rgyur 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sems can tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes pa ni gong du grangs su bcas pa ni sgrub pa'am slob dpon du smin par bya ba'i slob ma ste /
analyzed: des byang @308b chub kyi sems kyi rgyur 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir sems can tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes pa ni gong du grangs su bcas pa ni sgrub pa'am slob dpon du smin par bya ba'i slob ma ste /
translated: The above number is for disciples who are to be ripened as practitioners or masters.

original: de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams la yang snying rje chen po bskyed de dkyil 'khor der btsud na slob dpon nam sgrub pa por mi 'gyur yang dkyil 'khor du btsud cing byang chub tu sems bskyed na byang chub kyi rgyu sa bon du 'gyur ba'i phyir tshad
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams la yang snying rje chen po bskyed de dkyil 'khor der btsud na slob dpon nam sgrub pa por mi 'gyur yang dkyil 'khor du btsud cing byang chub tu sems bskyed na byang chub kyi rgyu sa bon du 'gyur ba'i phyir tshad
translated: However, one should generate great compassion for other sentient beings as well, and if they are admitted into the maṇḍala, even though they will not become masters or practitioners, if they are admitted into the maṇḍala and generate the mind of enlightenment, they will become a seed of enlightenment.

original: dang grangs tshad med par gzung ngo //
analyzed: dang grangs tshad med par gzung ngo //
translated: Therefore, one should take up immeasurable numbers.

original: de nas de dag bos la dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gtang bar yang bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de dag bos la dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gtang bar yang bya'o //
translated: Then, having summoned them, they should be caused to go for refuge to the Three Jewels.

original: sdig pa mi bya ba rnams kyang bsgo bar bya'i zhes pa nas /🔽bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi //
analyzed: sdig pa mi bya ba rnams kyang bsgo bar bya'i zhes pa nas / bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi //
translated: Those who do not commit evil deeds should be ordered to do so.

original: theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni //
analyzed: theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni //
translated: This supreme vehicle of the two truths

original: tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur //
translated: is attained by abiding in the method.

original: zhes pa'i bar du dkyil 'khor bri ba'i snga de nub slob ma rnams yongs su gzung ba'i rim pa bshad pa ste de yang rnam pa dgu'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i bar du dkyil 'khor bri ba'i snga de nub slob ma rnams yongs su gzung ba'i rim pa bshad pa ste de yang rnam pa dgu'o //
translated: This explains the stages of accepting the disciples the night before drawing the mandala, from confessing evil deeds up to🔽 Those who do not commit evil deeds should be ordered to do so.

original: dgu gang zhe na /
analyzed: dgu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the nine?

original: sdig pa bshags pa dang / skyabs su gtong ba dang / dus gsum gyi sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / dri dang me tog sbyin pa dang / so shing 'char gzhug pa dang / skud pas dpung pa bcings te srung ba dang /
analyzed: sdig pa bshags pa dang / skyabs su gtong ba dang / dus gsum gyi sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / dri dang me tog sbyin pa dang / so shing 'char gzhug pa dang / skud pas dpung pa bcings te srung ba dang /
translated: Confessing evil deeds, going for refuge, causing them to take the vow of unobstructed wisdom of the three times, giving them incense and flowers, having them chew tooth wood, binding their arms with thread as protection,

original: spro ba skyed pa dang / rmi lam bltar gzhug pa dang chos bshad pa rnams so //
analyzed: spro ba skyed pa dang / rmi lam bltar gzhug pa dang chos bshad pa rnams so //
translated: instilling enthusiasm, having them look at dreams, and explaining the Dharma.

original: de rnams kyang rgyud las ni kha cig ltag 'og tu 'byung mod kyi las su bya ba'i rim pa lta bur blta'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyang rgyud las ni kha cig ltag 'og tu 'byung mod kyi las su bya ba'i rim pa lta bur blta'o //
translated: Although these are found in various orders in the scriptures, they should be regarded as the sequence of the activities.

original: de las gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sbyin pa ston te /
analyzed: de las gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sbyin pa ston te /
translated: The three refuges are taught in the first three verses.

original: gsum ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: gsum ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: The three are the Buddha, the Dharma, and the community of noble bodhisattvas who have attained the stages.

original: brgya la sngon so sor thar pa la sogs pa'i sdom pa'i skabs su song zin pa yang slar yang 'dir skyabs su gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: brgya la sngon so sor thar pa la sogs pa'i sdom pa'i skabs su song zin pa yang slar yang 'dir skyabs su gtang bar bya'o //
translated: Even if one has previously taken the vows of individual liberation, etc., one should again take refuge here.

original: sngon song ba na dge 'dun 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad la skyabs su song gi 'dir sangs rgyas dang chos la skyabs su song ba snga ma dang mthun du zin kyang dge 'dun la mi mthun te /
analyzed: sngon song ba na dge 'dun 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad la skyabs su song gi 'dir sangs rgyas dang chos la skyabs su song ba snga ma dang mthun du zin kyang dge 'dun la mi mthun te /
translated: Previously, one took refuge in the community of eight noble individuals. Here, although one takes refuge in the Buddha and Dharma as before, one does not take refuge in the community.

original: 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bye brag tu skyabs su song ba'i phyir dang / de las gzhan pa skyabs su ma song ba rnams ni gdong skyabs su gtang bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bye brag tu skyabs su song ba'i phyir dang / de las gzhan pa skyabs su ma song ba rnams ni gdong skyabs su gtang bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the noble ones, the irreversible bodhisattvas, have gone for refuge in particular, and because those who have not gone for refuge in that way should be made to go for refuge.

original: de ste 'dir sngon skyabs su song zin pa yang brtan par bya ba'i phyir @309a * //
analyzed: de ste 'dir sngon skyabs su song zin pa yang brtan par bya ba'i phyir @309a * //
translated: If one has gone for refuge before, it is in order to stabilize it.

original: slar yang 'dir skyabs su gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: slar yang 'dir skyabs su gtang bar bya'o //
translated: One should go for refuge again here.

original: sdig pa mi bya ba rnams kyang bsgo bar bya'o zhes pa ni sngon chad byas pa'i sdig pa sngar bshags pa dang da ltar mi byad cing phyis mi bya bar khas blang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sdig pa mi bya ba rnams kyang bsgo bar bya'o zhes pa ni sngon chad byas pa'i sdig pa sngar bshags pa dang da ltar mi byad cing phyis mi bya bar khas blang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: One should also be instructed not to commit evil. This is because one confesses the evil one has done previously, and promises not to do it now or in the future.

original: de la da ltar mi byed cing phyis mi bya bar khas blang ba ni rigs na sngon byas zin pa slar bshags pa la don ci yod ce na /
analyzed: de la da ltar mi byed cing phyis mi bya bar khas blang ba ni rigs na sngon byas zin pa slar bshags pa la don ci yod ce na /
translated: If one promises not to do it now or in the future, that makes sense, but what is the point of confessing evil that one has already done in the past?

original: sdig pa sngon byas pa la yon tan du mi blta zhing /
analyzed: sdig pa sngon byas pa la yon tan du mi blta zhing /
translated: One should not regard evil done in the past as a good quality.

original: 'chags na 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe sdig pa byas pa'i dngos po de mngon du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'chags na 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe sdig pa byas pa'i dngos po de mngon du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If they are to be created, it is in order to prevent the manifestation of the thing that was done in sin at the time of death and transmigration.

original: da la sdig pa bshags pa yang gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sngon rol du bya ste de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: da la sdig pa bshags pa yang gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i sngon rol du bya ste de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Moreover, the confession of sin is to be done prior to going for refuge. Why is that?

original: sdig pa bshags shing gtsang mar byas pa'i lus can de skyabs su gtang ba'i 'os yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sdig pa bshags shing gtsang mar byas pa'i lus can de skyabs su gtang ba'i 'os yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the body of one who has confessed his sins and become pure is worthy to be taken for refuge.

original: de nas de dag la spos dang me tog la sogs pa spyin no zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de nas de dag la spos dang me tog la sogs pa spyin no zhes pa ni /
translated: Then one should give them incense, flowers, and so forth.

original: dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa gzung zin pa'i 'og tu bya ste de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa gzung zin pa'i 'og tu bya ste de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: This is to be done after one has taken up the vow of the wisdom of the three times without obscuration. Why is that?

original: de la sdig pa bshags shing skyabs su song la sdom pa bzung bas slob ma de snod du gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas yin pas dri dang me tog sbyin no //
analyzed: de la sdig pa bshags shing skyabs su song la sdom pa bzung bas slob ma de snod du gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas yin pas dri dang me tog sbyin no //
translated: Because the disciple, having confessed his sins, gone for refuge, and taken the vow, has become a vessel and is a worthy recipient, so one gives him incense and flowers.

original: de dag dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa yang 'dzin du gzhug go zhes pa la dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: de dag dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa yang 'dzin du gzhug go zhes pa la dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes te /
translated: The gnosis that is unobstructed in the three times is the gnosis of omniscience.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de ni shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus thams cad du yang dag pa nyid kyi dngos po sgrib pa med cing thogs pa med par mthong
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de ni shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus thams cad du yang dag pa nyid kyi dngos po sgrib pa med cing thogs pa med par mthong
translated: Since that gnosis of omniscience is characterized by the abandonment of the obstructions to omniscience and the afflictive obstructions, it sees the real thing without obstruction or impediment in all times, past, present, and future.

original: bas na dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: bas na dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Therefore it is the gnosis that is unobstructed in the three times.

original: ye shes de thob par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ye shes de thob par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to attain that gnosis,

original: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu spong ba'i sdom pa ni //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu spong ba'i sdom pa ni //
translated: the vow to abandon the ten nonvirtuous actions🔽is called the vow of the gnosis that is unobstructed in the three times.

original: dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa zhes bya la sngom pa de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bye brag gis zhib tu 'og nas 'chad do //
analyzed: dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa zhes bya la sngom pa de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bye brag gis zhib tu 'og nas 'chad do //
translated: That vow is explained in detail below in terms of its divisions into the conventional and the ultimate.

original: 'dzin du bcug nas sngags pa yis //
analyzed: 'dzin du bcug nas sngags pa yis //
translated: The mantra practitioner should have them hold it

original: de nas so shing dag kyang sbyin //🔽rtse gcig mnyam par gzhag pa dag / shar ram byang du kha bstan te //
analyzed: de nas so shing dag kyang sbyin // rtse gcig mnyam par gzhag pa dag / shar ram byang du kha bstan te //

analyzed: bdag nyid kha byang phyogs su bltas la so shing gi kha bdag la bltas na grub ba 'bring po myur du 'thob pa'i snod du 'gyur ro //
translated: If one faces north and the tooth-stick faces oneself, one will become a vessel for quickly attaining the middling powers.

original: so shing gi kha byad phyogs su bltas na zhi ba'i las 'grub par 'gyur la /
analyzed: so shing gi kha byad phyogs su bltas na zhi ba'i las 'grub par 'gyur la /
translated: If the tooth-stick faces the cardinal directions, the pacifying activities will be accomplished.

original: byang shar gyi mtshams su bltas na zhi dang rgyas pa gnyis ka 'grub par 'gyur zhing shar lho'i mtshams su bltas na mngon par spyod pa 'grub la /
analyzed: byang shar gyi mtshams su bltas na zhi dang rgyas pa gnyis ka 'grub par 'gyur zhing shar lho'i mtshams su bltas na mngon par spyod pa 'grub la /
translated: If it faces the northeast, both pacifying and increasing will be accomplished. If it faces the southeast, the activities of service will be accomplished.

original: lho nub kyi mtshams su bltas na bskrad pa dang skam pa la sogs pa'i las 'grub cing nub byang gi mtshams su bltas na gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa 'grub po //
analyzed: lho nub kyi mtshams su bltas na bskrad pa dang skam pa la sogs pa'i las 'grub cing nub byang gi mtshams su bltas na gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa 'grub po //
translated: If it faces the southwest, the activities of banishing, killing, and so on, will be accomplished. If it faces the northwest, the yakṣiṇī and so on will be accomplished.

original: so shing 'og gzhi la zugs te rtse mo bar snang la bltas na bar snang la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur la /
analyzed: so shing 'og gzhi la zugs te rtse mo bar snang la bltas na bar snang la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyur la /
translated: If the tooth-stick is stuck in the ground and the tip faces upward, the activities of the sky-farers will be accomplished.

original: gyen du bltas na rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa 'grub cing kha thur du bltas nas 'og tu 'gro pa grub pa'i snod du 'gyur te zhib tu ni gsang ba spyi'i rgyud la sogs par blta'o //
analyzed: gyen du bltas na rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa 'grub cing kha thur du bltas nas 'og tu 'gro pa grub pa'i snod du 'gyur te zhib tu ni gsang ba spyi'i rgyud la sogs par blta'o //
translated: If one looks up, one will accomplish the state of a knowledge-holder, and so forth. If one looks down, one will go below and become a vessel for accomplishment.

original: so shing gi ltas blta ba yang bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams la blta bar bya ba yin gyi /🔽slob ma phal pa rnams la ni so shing gi las de dag dang ldan du zin kyang grub pa la @310a * //
analyzed: so shing gi ltas blta ba yang bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnams la blta bar bya ba yin gyi / slob ma phal pa rnams la ni so shing gi las de dag dang ldan du zin kyang grub pa la @310a * //
translated: The omens of the tooth-stick should be examined for the disciples who possess the characteristics explained above.

original: sogs pa la de lta bu'i nan tan mi byed pas ltas de rnams ci nas kyang brtag dgos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sogs pa la de lta bu'i nan tan mi byed pas ltas de rnams ci nas kyang brtag dgos pa ma yin no //
translated: For ordinary disciples, even if they possess those actions of the tooth-stick, since they do not strive in that way for accomplishment, and so forth, it is not necessary to examine those omens at all.

original: de nas lag pa g-yon pa la //
analyzed: de nas lag pa g-yon pa la //
translated: Then, on the left hand

original: skud pa mdud pa gsum ldan pa //
analyzed: skud pa mdud pa gsum ldan pa //
translated: one should tie a thread with three knots

original: bdag nyid mnyam par gzhag pa yis //🔽legs pa ru ni bcing bar bya //
analyzed: bdag nyid mnyam par gzhag pa yis // legs pa ru ni bcing bar bya //
translated: with one’s mind in equipoise.

original: zhes pa ni 'phags pa mi g-yo ba 'am /
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'phags pa mi g-yo ba 'am /
translated: This is the procedure for the thread of Akṣobhya.

original: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba gang yang rung ba'i sngags kyis mdud pa re re zhing lan re gdab ste /
analyzed: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba gang yang rung ba'i sngags kyis mdud pa re re zhing lan re gdab ste /
translated: With any mantra of the Conqueror of the Three Realms, tie a knot in each of the protection cords.

original: slob ma de rnams bsrung ba'i phyir dpung pa g-yon pa la slob dpon nyid kyis bcing ngo //🔽de ltar yongs su gzung ldan pa'i //
analyzed: slob ma de rnams bsrung ba'i phyir dpung pa g-yon pa la slob dpon nyid kyis bcing ngo // de ltar yongs su gzung ldan pa'i //
translated: The master himself should tie one of the cords around his left upper arm in order to protect the disciples.🔽Thus, those disciples who are worthy of being accepted

original: slob ma nyes pa med rnams la //
analyzed: slob ma nyes pa med rnams la //
translated: and who are free of faults,

original: bsam pa brtan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bsam pa brtan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: in order to stabilize their intention,

original: 'di ltar spro ba bskyed par bya //
analyzed: 'di ltar spro ba bskyed par bya //
translated: should be encouraged in this way.

original: zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gzengs bstod na slob ma rnams dga' zhing spro bas sems brtan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas gzengs bstod na slob ma rnams dga' zhing spro bas sems brtan par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are inspired by the verses that follow, the disciples will be delighted and their minds will be stabilized.

original: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
translated: You great beings

original: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
analyzed: rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed //
translated: have today gained unequaled treasure,

original: gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
analyzed: gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
translated: because all the conquerors and their sons

original: bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni //🔽bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni // bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
translated: All you great beings🔽have been accepted by all the buddhas

original: yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa //
analyzed: yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa //
translated: as you were born into this teaching.

original: de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la //
analyzed: de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la //
translated: Therefore, in the Great Vehicle

original: sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur //🔽zhes pa ste /
analyzed: sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur // zhes pa ste /
translated: You will be born into it tomorrow.🔽Thus, by confessing your sins, going for refuge, and taking the vows, you will attain that unsurpassed enlightenment, which is unequaled.

original: de ltar khyed kyis sdig pa bshags shing skyabs su 'gro ba dang sdom pa bzung bas mnyam pa med pa'i rnyed pa bla na med pa'i byang chub de yang rnyed do zhes pa ste de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar khyed kyis sdig pa bshags shing skyabs su 'gro ba dang sdom pa bzung bas mnyam pa med pa'i rnyed pa bla na med pa'i byang chub de yang rnyed do zhes pa ste de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pas bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pas bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because you have been accepted by the victors and their sons in this teaching.

original: de bas na khyed rnams de ring ni theg pa chen po la skye bzhin pa yin la sang ni theg pa chen po la skye bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na khyed rnams de ring ni theg pa chen po la skye bzhin pa yin la sang ni theg pa chen po la skye bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, today you are being born into the Great Vehicle, and tomorrow you will be born into the Great Vehicle.

original: de la rnyed pa mnyam me ces pa pa ni sngags kyi tshul la spyod pa dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa chen po pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dang yang mi mnyam pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnyed pa mnyam me ces pa pa ni sngags kyi tshul la spyod pa dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa chen po pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa dang yang mi mnyam pa yin nam zhe na /
translated: In this regard, it is said that “unequaled attainment” means that those who practice in the manner of mantra are not equal to all the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas in the Great Vehicle of the perfections and so forth.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa la spyod par 'dra yang 'dir sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa la khyad par du lhag par spyod pas rnyed pa mnyam par med pa ste rnyed ces pa de lta bu thob ces pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa la spyod par 'dra yang 'dir sngags kyi bzlas pa la sogs pa la khyad par du lhag par spyod pas rnyed pa mnyam par med pa ste rnyed ces pa de lta bu thob ces pa'o //
translated: Although they are similar in practicing the perfections and so forth, here they are unequalled in their attainment, because they practice in a special way with the mantra repetitions and so forth.

original: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
translated: You great beings,

original: zhes pa ni slob ma rnams la bstod pa'i tshig ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni slob ma rnams la bstod pa'i tshig ste /
translated: This is a statement of praise to the disciples.

original: de lta bu'i mthu chen po zhugs pas btsun pa zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: de lta bu'i mthu chen po zhugs pas btsun pa zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Since such great power has entered them, they are called “venerable.”

original: rgyal @310b ba sras bcas pa zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sras dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: rgyal @310b ba sras bcas pa zhes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sras dang bcas pa ste /
translated: “The victors and their sons” are the Bhagavan Buddhas and their sons, the Bodhisattvas.

original: gang phyir rgyal ba kun gyis khyed rnams zhes sbrel lo //
analyzed: gang phyir rgyal ba kun gyis khyed rnams zhes sbrel lo //
translated: “Because all the victors have fully entrusted you” is connected to this.

original: bstan pa 'di la kun yongs su gzung zhes kyang sbyar te /
analyzed: bstan pa 'di la kun yongs su gzung zhes kyang sbyar te /
translated: “Fully take hold of this teaching” is also connected.

original: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pas sngags spyad pa'i bstan pa 'dir yongs su bzung bas na khyed rnams kyis mnyam pa med pa'i rnyed pa thob po zhes par 'brel lo //
analyzed: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pas sngags spyad pa'i bstan pa 'dir yongs su bzung bas na khyed rnams kyis mnyam pa med pa'i rnyed pa thob po zhes par 'brel lo //
translated: Since the Victorious Ones and their sons have fully accepted this teaching of the practice of mantra, you have obtained an incomparable treasure.

original: skye bzhen pa ni theg pa chen po skye bzhin pa ste /
analyzed: skye bzhen pa ni theg pa chen po skye bzhin pa ste /
translated: The arising of the Great Vehicle is the arising of the Great Vehicle.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: de phyir de rnams theg chen la //
analyzed: de phyir de rnams theg chen la //
translated: thus, for them, in the Great Vehicle,

original: sangs ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur //
translated: enlightenment will arise.

original: zhes pa ste sang lta bu dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe theg pa chen po'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa skyes zin zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ste sang lta bu dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe theg pa chen po'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa skyes zin zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Thus, when one enters the mandala, like a sun, the arising of the generation of the mind of enlightenment of the Great Vehicle is said to be arisen.

original: gal te rmi lam dag tu //
analyzed: gal te rmi lam dag tu //
translated: If in dreams

original: gtsug lag khang dang kun dga' bzang //
analyzed: gtsug lag khang dang kun dga' bzang //
translated: monasteries and delightful

original: zhes pa nas //
analyzed: zhes pa nas //
translated: up to

original: brtul zhugs bzang po khyed rnams kyis //
analyzed: brtul zhugs bzang po khyed rnams kyis //
translated: you, with good discipline,

original: nang par thams cad la zlos //
analyzed: nang par thams cad la zlos //
translated: recite everything in the morning.

original: slob ma de dag rnams la ni //
analyzed: slob ma de dag rnams la ni //
translated: To those disciples

original: de skad bsgo nas chos kyang bshad //
analyzed: de skad bsgo nas chos kyang bshad //
translated: having thus instructed, the Dharma is explained.

original: ces pa'i bar dag gis ni de ltar spro ba bskyed pa la sogs pa byas nas slob ma rnams la rmi lam gyi ltas 'di rnams bstan te 'di rnams las gang mthong ba de slob dpon la zlos su gzhug pa ste //
analyzed: ces pa'i bar dag gis ni de ltar spro ba bskyed pa la sogs pa byas nas slob ma rnams la rmi lam gyi ltas 'di rnams bstan te 'di rnams las gang mthong ba de slob dpon la zlos su gzhug pa ste //
translated: Having thus generated enthusiasm and so forth, the teacher should explain these dream signs to the disciples and have them report to the master whatever they experience.
